interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Pharmacopia Tangerine-Flavored Lip Balm - Set of 2, 0.25oz - Nourishing Herbal Lip Elixir with 100% Natural and Certified Organic Ingredients Review Date: 2020/02/27 Store: Pharmacopia Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pharmacopia', 'Item Form': 'Balm', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Soothing,Nourishing', 'Package Dimensions': '3.6 x 1.7 x 0.7 inches; 0.25 Ounces', 'UPC': '087819800366'} Review Text: I spend 99% of my life with chapped lips, so I’m always looking for a chapstick or lip balm that will actually work.

I was intrigued by the hemp oil in the Pharmacopia Tangerine-Flavored Lip Balm. But not all of the ingredients are listed in the product information. I am allergic to beeswax, which is the second ingredient in the lip balm. So I was unable to use it.

I’m including a picture of the tube, but for reference, here are the ingredients: helianthus annuus (sunflower) oil, beeswax/cire d’abeille, olea europaea (extra virgin olive) oil, aroma (flavor), cannabis sativa (hemp) seed oil, rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract, tocopherol (vitamin E), aloe barbadensis. Review Title: Pharmacopia Tangerine-Flavored Lip Balm Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Water Flosser Cordless Oral Irrigator Portable Rechargeable Dental Flossers with 5 Modes & 6 Tips Water Flossing with 300ml Water Tank for Home and Travel, Braces & Bridges Care (Blue) Duomishu {'Brand': 'Duomishu', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Special Feature': 'Por, Multiple Operation Modes, Multiple Tips', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Tank Volume': '300 Milliliters', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.9 x 5 x 3.1 inches; 1.2 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'hf-6', 'Batteries': '1 Lithium Ion batteries required. (included)', 'UPC': '786738939194', 'Manufacturer': 'Duomishu'} If you’ve never used a water flosser before, there’s a definite learning curve. Expect to get wet the first few times, if not more. The learning curve and mess is worth it -- my mouth generally feels cleaner after using one -- but I don’t love this particular model.

I wanted a water flosser that wouldn’t take up a lot of space on my bathroom counter. This one is a sort of all-in-one, with the reservoir built into the handle, but I kept getting water bubbles in the tank/tip, which made flossing take a lot longer.

There’s only 3 speeds: low, medium, and high. The low is quite low. And because of where the speed switch button is, it’s really easy to accidentally switch speeds while using the flosser.

The flosser charges via USB, but with a proprietary end (not A or C or anything like that). Cordless Water Flosser Pharmacopia Tangerine-Flavored Lip Balm - Set of 2, 0.25oz - Nourishing Herbal Lip Elixir with 100% Natural and Certified Organic Ingredients Pharmacopia {'Brand': 'Pharmacopia', 'Item Form': 'Balm', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Soothing,Nourishing', 'Package Dimensions': '3.6 x 1.7 x 0.7 inches; 0.25 Ounces', 'UPC': '087819800366'} I spend 99% of my life with chapped lips, so I’m always looking for a chapstick or lip balm that will actually work.

I was intrigued by the hemp oil in the Pharmacopia Tangerine-Flavored Lip Balm. But not all of the ingredients are listed in the product information. I am allergic to beeswax, which is the second ingredient in the lip balm. So I was unable to use it.

I’m including a picture of the tube, but for reference, here are the ingredients: helianthus annuus (sunflower) oil, beeswax/cire d’abeille, olea europaea (extra virgin olive) oil, aroma (flavor), cannabis sativa (hemp) seed oil, rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract, tocopherol (vitamin E), aloe barbadensis. Pharmacopia Tangerine-Flavored Lip Balm
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Health & Hygiene Focus**: The user prioritizes oral hygiene, as indicated by the purchase of a water flosser, and extends this concern to lip care, seeking products that effectively combat chapped lips.
- **Ingredient Awareness**: Displays a keen awareness of ingredients due to specific allergies (e.g., beeswax), suggesting a preference for transparency and safety in personal care products.
- **Portability**: Prefers portable and travel-friendly products, aligning with an active lifestyle or frequent travel.
- **Space Efficiency**: Values compact design, indicating a desire for products that do not occupy much counter space.
- **Ease of Use**: Finds the learning curve of new hygiene tools challenging and favors intuitive operation to minimize inconvenience.
- **Functional Features**: Interested in multiple operational modes and settings for customization, yet prefers straightforward controls to avoid accidental adjustments.
- **Charging Convenience**: Favors USB charging options and is critical of proprietary connectors, reflecting an awareness of practicality in charging solutions.
- **Skepticism Towards Claims**: Demonstrates a cautious approach to new products, looking for those with solid performance and reliable ingredients rather than marketing fluff.

Overall, the user seeks a blend of effectiveness, convenience, and safety in personal care tools, alongside simplicity in design and ingredient clarity.
